content: Well, I have been out cold sick but I would still like to try to do something minimal(maybe even tomorrow). I would like to 1. marshal from java to json/json to java with HAPI java objects and 2. have minimal footprint(ie. not every single bean for entire FHIR protocol). I would like mainly just the java beans for Practitioner, Organization, Practitioner Role, Network, Location (ie. everything seen in 'Overview of Payer Directory' at https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/index.html). Which java maven artifacts would I start with? thanks, Dean cc: @Dave Hill @Saul Kravitz
https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/introduction/downloading_and_importing.html. ???? This is the only Java package I'm familiar with.
